entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
